description: Script to remove small clusters or standalone voxels from an ROI/atlas dataset

input_dset.title: Input Dataset
input_dset.description: Required input dataset. This dataset should be set of integer values. The program mostly assumes approximate isotropic voxels.

output_dir.title: Output Directory
output_dir.description: Directory name for output. All output goes to this directory.

nvox_thresh.title: Voxel Threshold
nvox_thresh.description: Number of voxels in a cluster to keep

frac_thresh.title: Fraction Threshold
frac_thresh.description: Fraction of voxels in a cluster to keep [0.0-1.0]

prefix.title: Output Prefix
prefix.description: Base name of final output dataset, i.e. baseprefix.nii.gz

neighborhood_type.title: Neighborhood Type
neighborhood_type.description: Neighborhood type using in finding mode: 1 - facing neighbors, 2 - edges, 3 - corners
